P

piccross - package piccross
 
PiccrossModel - Class in piccross
This class will have all the logic related to our game which will intact with view
PiccrossModel() - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossModel
no arg contractor for PicrossModel objects.
piccrossModel - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
panels we are using in our frame
PiccrossModel.numPanel - Class in piccross
This class is used to create numPanel object which is a JPanel with a int value
PiccrossNetworkModalVC - Class in piccross
PiccrossNetworkModalVC creates a basic UI to get user input for a network connection.
PiccrossNetworkModalVC(JFrame) - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossNetworkModalVC
This constructor requires a reference to the JFrame it will "interrupt".
PiccrossNetworkModalVC.Controller - Class in piccross
Inner class to manage user input and test for errors.
PiccrossSplashScreen - Class in piccross
Beginning of PiccrossSplashScreen class
PiccrossSplashScreen(int) - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossSplashScreen
Beginning of PiccrossSplashScreen - Allows the duration
PiccrossView - Class in piccross
Picross class represents our frame in Picross game.
PiccrossView() - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossView
Picross class object constructor.
PiccrossView(Socket, JTextArea, boolean) - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossView
Picross class object constructor that will be called if a new game is called after running the initial game.
PiccrossView.CheckBoxHandler - Class in piccross
ItemListener for Mark Check Box as inner class inside Picross class.
PiccrossView.debugConfig1 - Class in piccross
ActionListener for debug sub menu debug configuration 1 which will create a predefined game that all outside boxes are correct.
PiccrossView.debugConfig2 - Class in piccross
ActionListener for debug sub menu debug configuration 2 which will create a predefined game that only the middle box is correct.
PiccrossView.debugConfig3 - Class in piccross
ActionListener for debug sub menu debug configuration 3 which will create a predefined game that all boxes are false.
PiccrossView.disconnect - Class in piccross
This class will implement ActionListener and disconnects from server if selected from menu.
PiccrossView.exit - Class in piccross
ActionListener for exit item on menu which will exit the game.
PiccrossView.hoverToggle - Class in piccross
This method will implement ActionListener and will enable or disable hover feature of the game.
PiccrossView.newGame - Class in piccross
ActionListener for new game item on menu which will create a new random game.
PiccrossView.openConnection - Class in piccross
This class will implement ActionListener and will open a dialog box to get information from user and try connects to server.
PiccrossView.openConnection.Connect - Class in piccross
 
PiccrossView.PicrossNetworkController - Class in piccross
This class which extends Thread will be used to run the network controller thread so while we are reading messages from server user will be still able to play the game.
PiccrossView.reset - Class in piccross
ActionListener for restarting the game and timer.
PiccrossView.setSize10 - Class in piccross
This class will implement ActionListener and will set the size of game to 10*10 when selected from menu.
PiccrossView.setSize15 - Class in piccross
This class will implement ActionListener and will set the size of game to 15*15 when selected from menu.
PiccrossView.setSize5 - Class in piccross
This class will implement ActionListener and will set the size of game to 5*5 when selected from menu.
PiccrossView.showAbout - Class in piccross
ActionListener for show about in menu which will pop up a dialog windows and shows information regarding software.
PiccrossView.showSolution - Class in piccross
ActionListener for show solution in menu which will mark the correct game moves with green color.
PiccrossView.textAreaListener - Class in piccross
This class will implement KeyListener and will implement the lister for console input text area so when ever user press enter key it will execute the code.
PicrossNetworkController() - Constructor for class piccross.PiccrossView.PicrossNetworkController
 
pointLabel - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
pointLabel will display "Points : " in our Picross game.pointLabel is a label inside pointPanel.
pointPanel - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossView
pointPanel will hold pointTextField.pointPanel is placed at NORTH of consolePanel.
points - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossModel
Represents the points of the user.
pointTextField - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossModel
Represents the text field which will hold the points for the user.
portError - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossNetworkModalVC
Labels for feedback regarding name, port and address errors respectively.
portInput - Variable in class piccross.PiccrossNetworkModalVC
Will be used by the user to select desired port.
pressedConnect() - Method in class piccross.PiccrossNetworkModalVC
Used to test the modal to see how the user exited: Did they press connect or cancel?
